com.clover.sdk.v1.app

Class AppNotificationReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.clover.sdk.v1.app.AppNotificationReceiver

  • public abstract class AppNotificationReceiver
extends BroadcastReceiver
    Handles an AppNotificationIntent.ACTION_APP_NOTIFICATION intent.
